mapper.select: /* MembrProdMapper.getMembrProdDetail */ SELECT tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tmm.MEMBR_NICKNM, tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD, tmm.MEMBR_CARD_NO, tmm.REG_STORE_CD, tmm.POST_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.ADDR) AS ADDR, SBPENC.D(tmm.ADDR_DTL) AS ADDR_DTL, tmm.LUNAR_YN, tmm.BIRTHDAY, tmm.GENDR_FG, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO, tmm.SHORT_NO, tmm.WEDDING_YN, tmm.WEDDINGDAY, tmm.EMAIL_ADDR, tmm.EMAIL_RECV_YN, tmm.SMS_RECV_YN, tmm.REMARK, tmm.USE_YN, tmm.REG_DT, tmm.REG_ID, tmm.MOD_DT, tmm.MOD_ID FROM TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE tmm.MEMBR_NO = #{membrNo} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_NM = #{membrNm}
